The endpoint is subject to rate limiting and automatically applies default configurations such as generating a random icon and initializing the workspace with default settings (for example, a default dashboard or home page). On success, the new spaceâ€™s full metadata is returned, enabling the client to immediately switch context to the new internal."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create space"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/spaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new space based on a supplied name and description in the JSON request body. The endpoint is subject to rate limiting and automatically applies default configurations such as generating a random icon and initializing the workspace with default settings (for example, a default dashboard or home page). On success, the new spaceâ€™s full metadata is returned, enabling the client to immediately switch context to the new internal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The version of the API to use","in":"header","name":"Anytype-Version","required":true,"schema":{"default":"2025-11-08","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"description":{"description":"The description of the space","example":"The local-first wiki","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"The name of the space","example":"New Space","type":"string"}},"required":["name"],"type":"object","title":"CreateSpaceRequest"}}},"description":"The space to create","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
